search_placeholder: Search for videos, destinations, or users...

user_no_reposts_yet: This user hasn't reposted any videos yet.
language_description: Choose your preferred language for the app.
theme_description: Choose your preferred theme for the app.
delete_video_confirmation: Are you sure you want to delete this video?
no_videos_in_category: No videos found for this category yet.
no_videos_at_destination: No videos found for this destination yet.
suggest_page_description: Know a great travel spot that's not in our app? Let us know! Your suggestions help us add new and exciting destinations for everyone to explore.
upload_click_drag_drop: Click to upload or drag and drop
reason_label: Why should we add this place?
reason_placeholder: Tell us what makes this place special...
suggestion_success_description: Thanks for helping us grow. We'll review your suggestion.
video_title_placeholder: e.g., My amazing trip to the mountains
description_placeholder: Tell us more about your video...
upload_complete_message: Upload complete! Your video is now being processed.
no_comments_yet: No comments yet. Be the first to comment!
link_copied_description: The video link has been copied to your clipboard.
repost_successful_description: You have successfully reposted the video.
login_subtitle: Enter your email below to login to your account
username_description: You can only change your username once every 14 days.
no_suggestions_description: You've reached the end! Check back later for more people to follow.
no_following_videos_description: Start following creators to see their videos here.
no_saved_videos: You haven't saved any videos yet.
video_saved_description: The video has been added to your saved list.
video_unsaved_description: The video has been removed from your saved list.
direct_upload_access_description: Apply to get access to upload videos directly from your device.
access_granted_description: You have access to direct video uploads.
apply_for_access_description: Get approved to upload high-quality videos directly.
apply_direct_upload_description: Fill out the form below to request access. We're looking for creators who consistently post high-quality travel content.
why_access_label: Why do you want direct upload access?
why_access_placeholder: Tell us about the kind of content you create and why you'd be a good fit.
application_submitted_description: We've received your application and will review it shortly. You'll be notified of our decision.
